author: kai zhu <kaizhu256@gmail.com>
description: this is the zero-dependency version of mysql v2.12.0
name: mysql-lite

scripts.postinstall: for DIR in .bin electron-lite utility2; do     (if [ -d node_modules/$DIR ] && [ ! -d $DIR ]; then mv node_modules/$DIR .; fi); done; rm -fr node_modules && ln -s . node_modules
scripts.start: export PORT=${PORT:-8080} && export npm_config_mode_auto_restart=1 && utility2 shRun shIstanbulCover test.js
scripts.test: export PORT=$(utility2 shServerPortRandom) && utility2 test test.js
